One of the most toxic communities out there with no remorse. They got all, from calling people faggots to the hard r, they will absolutely shred you for not clutching that 1v5. Overall fun game to play with friends. Can be heart throbbing.

Jogo é bem educativo e um bom passa tempo

Rekabetçi modunda garip bir rank sistemi mevcut, 8 maç üst üste kazanıp rank atlayamadığınız da oluyor iki maç kazanıp atladığınızda. Gerçekten merak ediyorum bu iş tam olarak neye göre yapılıyor. Battle royal modu keşke birazdaha geliştirilse, şu haliyle pek oynanılası değil malesef.
Great, addictive fast paced game. Easy and fun to play with friends. One thing thats annoying is i had to buy prime status to avoid hackers, which was just under 15 euros
hileden geçilmiyo  face it ac gibi bir program şart
good competitive shooter, fun with friends but VERY toxic community

The matchmaking of this game is terrible, I think the major reason people quit this game is because its not fun in the lobby, its too toxic and the skill matching is terrible! Uninstalling, its sad that after millions of games they cant fix something like this, hell even pubg has better matchmaking!
